name: Alkurai
description:
Overview

Alkurai is an immersive co-op Fantasy Horror game for 1-4 players. The kingdom of Alkurai has been seized by the now infamous Alchemist. His true intentions are unknown, but his "miscreations" have resulted in the loss of countless lives. A job listing has been put up across the world with a generous reward. You and your party must rise to the occasion and save the kingdom of Alkurai.

The Story

  • Alkurai's Royal Garden
    Possible 2 Additional Chapter's

    Key Gameplay

    • 1-4 Players
    • Intricate Puzzle Progression
    • Maze/Dungeon style maps
    • Linear Game Progression

      Unique Features

      • An inspired Dark Fantasy Horror Game
      • Original Story and Lore
      • Drinking Mechanic
      • Sanity Bar
